![Blink Labs, Gimbalabs, and Andamio join forces to deliver the â€œCardano Go Live Codingâ€ sessions.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2Fe37857c9-d9f8-4dd4-a301-c668fbaac4f3%2F&w=3840&q=75)

Every Monday at 13:00 UTC, the teams from **Blink Labs**, **Gimbalabs**, and **Andamio platform** meet to explore the depths of the intersection between the Golang programming language and the Cardano stack, in the framework of the â€œCardano Go Live Codingâ€ sessions.

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ«Concepts of daily use in the Cardano development ecosystem are brought to light very naturally. For example: ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’»How a CLI, such as the famous Cardano CLI, is built? After watching the first few minutes of the following session, you will be able to fit into your long-term memory a general idea of the subject: <https://youtu.be/rmzo-pCwppw?si=QuJJsokGBQlZCv11>
